description:
Dot likes to visit the dude ranch in Dry Gulch Desert. The farm animals there can make the funniest sounds!  
Help Dot mimic the sounds of the animals.

puzzles.description: Make Dot play a silly sound when tilted upside down. Then make Dot do nothing when tilted upright.

hints.description: Drag out a Do Nothing state and a silly sound. Choose something for Dot to say. Link Start to the sound using an Upside Down cue. Link the sound to Do Nothing using an Upright cue.

puzzles.description: After doing nothing, make Dot randomly choose to turn on red, magenta, or yellow lights.

hints.description: Link the states with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After each light, make Dot automatically play an animal sound.

hints.description: Drag out three Animals sounds and choose an animal. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After each animal sound, make Dot automatically turn the lights off. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a Lights Off state. Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot act like animals on the farm. Tilt Dot until you hear all three animal sounds.
puzzles.introduction: Dude!  It's time to round up the animals on the dude ranch!
